item.title: Why Functional is Named Functional
item.description: The term “functional analysis” is indeed intriguing, especially when considering the word “functional” instead of merely “function analysis.” At first glance, “functional” appears to be an adjective form of “function,” suggesting meanings like “function-like” or “pertaining to functions.” This notion can also be found in another name for functionals, “generalized functions.” The question arises as to why these are not simply called functions.
